title: windows 10 is doing the thing where it lies to my face and slows my computer to a crawl
body:
i open up task manager and its business as usual there, but there obviously is some task running since my entire computer has slowed to narcolepsy levels.

i would just like to thank windows 10 developers for being so fucking petty they want to hide the fact that their shit is slow as fuck instead of just letting me choose when I want to be slowed down.

why can't I have an option where I choose when windows does all the tasks it needs to do (updates and other activities that slow the computer) instead of just taking it up the ass in the middle of a game where I basically have to concede because it is too difficult to play at <20 fps
